REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0165 reute r f BC-FIRSTIER-<FRST>-NAMES 03-05 0046

TEXT.TITLE: FIRSTIER <FRST> NAMES NEW CHIEF EXECUTIVE
TEXT.BODY: FirsTier Inc said president William C. Smith has been named chief executive officer, succeeding Charles W. Durham, who remains chairman. The company said Durham had been chief executive on an interim basis only. Reuter
